__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Archer
data.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against high ranged armor targets
- Countered by Horsemen

variations.name: Archer
variations.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against high ranged armor targets
- Countered by Horsemen
variations.descriptionCN:
成本低廉的远程步兵，能对无护甲的目标造成可观伤害。
+ 射速高
- 不擅长对付高远程护甲目标
- 会受到骑手克制

variations.description:

- Countered by Horsemen

- 不擅长对付高远程护甲目标
- 会受到骑手克制

variations.description:

+ High rate of fire

- Countered by Horsemen
variations.descriptionCN:

- 会受到骑手克制

data.name: Battering Ram
data.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Takes bonus damage from melee attacks
- Can only attack buildings
- Slow movement speed

variations.name: Battering Ram
variations.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Takes bonus damage from melee attacks
- Can only attack buildings
- Slow movement speed
variations.descriptionCN:
耐久的步兵运输工具，擅长对付建筑及城墙。
+ 高远程护甲
+ 高生命值
- 只能通过近战攻击受到额外的伤害
- 只能攻击建筑
- 移动速度慢

data.name: Bombard
data.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.
+ High damage
- Must be set up to fire

variations.name: Bombard
variations.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.
+ High damage
- Must be set up to fire
variations.descriptionCN:
可怕的攻城炮，非常擅于对付建筑或任何顽强的目标。
+ 高伤害
- 必须架设才能开火

data.name: Counterweight Trebuchet
data.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units

variations.name: Counterweight Trebuchet
variations.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units
variations.descriptionCN:
强大的攻城器械，擅长从极远的距离摧毁建筑及城墙。
+ 对建筑有伤害加成
- 必须架设才能开火
- 无法精准命中单位

data.name: Demolition Ship
data.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction

variations.name: Demolition Ship
variations.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction
variations.descriptionCN:
装满炸药的小船。被歼灭后会爆炸，对区域内的所有单位造成伤害。
- 离爆炸中心越远造成伤害越低
- 自毁是唯一武器

data.name: Donso
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units. Periodically throws a javelin when attacking from ranged.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Additional damage against Elephants
+ Comes with melee armor
- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers and Longbowmen

variations.name: Donso
variations.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units. Periodically throws a javelin when attacking from ranged.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Additional damage against Elephants
+ Comes with melee armor
- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers and Longbowmen
variations.descriptionCN:
最适合用来对付骑兵单位的步兵。远程攻击时定期投掷标枪。
+ 反骑兵专家
+ 对象兵造成额外伤害
+ 自带近战护甲
- 不擅长对付重型步兵
- 会受到弓兵和长弓兵克制

data.name: Fishing Boat
data.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Drops off gathered resources at the Dock.
+ Can repair
- No combat

variations.name: Fishing Boat
variations.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Drops off gathered resources at the Dock.
+ Can repair
- No combat
variations.descriptionCN:
从深海鱼群或海岸鱼群采集食物的小型船只。在码头处存放采集到的资源。
+ 可以修理
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Freeborn Warrior
data.description:
Infantry with high ranged armor and bonus against ranged.
+ Strong against ranged units
-weak against heavy melee units

variations.description:

data.name: Hunting Canoe
data.description:
Light war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability and speed.
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

variations.name: Hunting Canoe
variations.description:
Light war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability and speed.
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology
variations.descriptionCN:

+ 操控性和速度提升。
+ 可从铁匠铺的远程伤害科技中获得加成。

data.name: Imam
data.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Heals friendly units
- Slow movement speed

variations.descriptionCN:

- 移动速度较慢

+ Increased weapon range
+ Comes with ranged armor
- Low health

data.name: Mansa Musofadi Warrior
data.description:
Infantry effective at ambush attacks and countering heavy targets. Has additional melee armor and health.
+ Can enter stealth
+ Anti-heavy specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Archers
- Capital Town Centers, Outposts, and Scouts can spot stealth

variations.name: Mansa Musofadi Warrior
variations.description:
Infantry effective at ambush attacks and countering heavy targets. Has additional melee armor and health.
+ Can enter stealth
+ Anti-heavy specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Archers
- Capital Town Centers, Outposts, and Scouts can spot stealth
variations.descriptionCN:
擅长伏击和克制重型目标的步兵。拥有额外的近战护甲和生命值。
+ 可以进入匿踪状态
+ 反重型专家
- 生命值低
- 受弓兵克制
- 首都城镇中心、哨站和侦察兵可以识破匿踪

data.name: Vanguard Scout
data.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
+ Health regeneration
- Very weak in combat

variations.name: Vanguard Scout
variations.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
+ Health regeneration
- Very weak in combat
variations.descriptionCN:
轻武装骑兵，擅长探索世界、狩猎野生动物及牧羊。
+ 能看穿浓密森林
+ 生命值恢复
- 战斗能力非常弱

data.name: Siege Tower
data.description:
Tall infantry transport with no combat capability. Allows garrisoned infantry to be unloaded directly onto Stone Walls.
+ High ranged armor
- Cannot attack
- Slow movement speed

variations.description:

+ 高远程护甲
- 无法攻击
- 移动速度较慢

data.name: Springald
data.description:
Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.
+ Does not require setup to fire
+ Bonus damage vs. melee infantry
- Trivial damage vs. buildings

variations.name: Springald
variations.description:
Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.
+ Does not require setup to fire
+ Bonus damage vs. melee infantry
- Trivial damage vs. buildings
variations.descriptionCN:
反单位攻城武器。能发射可穿透多个单位的弩箭。
+ 无需架设即可发射
+ 对近战步兵造成额外伤害
- 对建筑造成的伤害极低

data.name: Trade Ship
data.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
- No combat

variations.name: Trade Ship
variations.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
- No combat
variations.descriptionCN:
商船在被派往有海岸贸易站或其他玩家码头的贸易路线时，可产生黄金和木材。
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Trader
data.description:
Traders generate Gold by travelling between their Home Market and a Trade Post or another player's Market. Greater distances between the Home Market and trade destination will generate higher amounts of Gold.
The Home Market or Trade destination may be changed at any time.

variations.name: Trader
variations.description:
Traders generate Gold by travelling between their Home Market and a Trade Post or another player's Market. Greater distances between the Home Market and trade destination will generate higher amounts of Gold.
The Home Market or Trade destination may be changed at any time.
variations.descriptionCN:
商人通过在他们的本国市场和贸易站或其他玩家的市场之间的往来产生黄金。本国市场和贸易目的地之间的距离越远，产生的黄金就越多。
本国市场或贸易目的地可以随时更改。

data.name: Transport Ship
data.description:
Large oared vessel able to transport land units across water.
+ Can be garrisoned by any unit
+ Attacks with javelins for each unit garrisoned
+ Uses sight range of units in garrison

variations.name: Transport Ship
variations.description:
Large oared vessel able to transport land units across water.
+ Can be garrisoned by any unit
+ Attacks with javelins for each unit garrisoned
+ Uses sight range of units in garrison
variations.descriptionCN:
大型带桨船只，可运送陆上单位渡过水域。
+ 任何单位都能驻扎
+ 每驻扎一个单位，就用标枪攻击一次。
+ 使用驻扎于其中的单位的视野范围

data.name: Villager
data.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat

variations.name: Villager
variations.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat
variations.descriptionCN:
采集木材、食物、石料和黄金。建造并修理建筑，也可修理攻城器械和海军单位。
- 战斗能力弱

data.name: War Canoe
data.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability

variations.name: War Canoe
variations.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability
variations.descriptionCN:
配备船侧弩炮的船只。
+ 很擅长对付步弓手船
- 操控性较低

data.name: Warrior Scout
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Increased health regeneration
+ Increased move speed
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
- Weak in combat

variations.name: Warrior Scout
variations.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Increased health regeneration
+ Increased move speed
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
- Weak in combat
variations.descriptionCN:
行动快速的骑兵，擅长突袭、探索世界、狩猎野生动物和放牧绵羊。
+ 更高生命值恢复
+ 更高移动速度
+ 能看穿浓密森林
- 战斗中较弱

variations.name: Veteran Warrior Scout
variations.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Bonus damage vs ranged
+ Increased health regeneration
+ Increased move speed
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
- Weak in combat
variations.descriptionCN:
行动快速的骑兵，擅长突袭、探索世界、狩猎野生动物和牧羊。
+ 对远程单位造成伤害加成
+ 更高生命值恢复
+ 更高移动速度
+ 能看穿浓密森林
- 战斗中较弱

variations.name: Elite Warrior Scout
variations.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding and fighting ranged units.
+ Bonus damage vs ranged
+ Increased health regeneration
+ Increased move speed
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
- Weak vs melee units
variations.descriptionCN:
行动快速的骑兵，擅长突袭和对抗远程单位。
+ 对远程单位造成额外伤害 
+ 更高生命值恢复
+ 更高移动速度
+ 能看穿浓密森林
- 不擅对抗近战单位
